DOC.brief_summary: An optimal angiographic viewing angle is critical for correct diagnosis and intervention in coronary bifurcation lesion percutaneous coronary interventions (PCI). The current study aims at validating a dedicated software tool (MEDIS, Leiden, The Netherlands) that will improve the selection of the best viewing angle.
DOC.brief_title: BOVAS: Bifurcation Optimal Viewing Angle Selection Study
DOC.criteria: Patient older than 18 years of age Informed consent available Hemodynamic unstability (cardiogenic shock, lifethreatening arrhythmias, inotropic support) Impaired renal function (serum creatinine > 2.0 mg/dl)
